mapper.select: SELECT b.booking_no AS bookingNo, b.booking_count AS bookingCount, b.booking_request AS bookingRequest, b.booking_time AS bookingTime, b.booking_state AS bookingState, b.booking_count * b.deposit AS deposit, b.booking_book_no AS bookingBookNo, b.deposit deposit2, b.booking_chatname AS bookingChatName, bo.bookingok_no AS bookingOkNo FROM booking b JOIN bookingok bo ON b.booking_no = bo.booking_no WHERE b.business_id = #{businessId}
SELECT bu.normal_id normalId FROM booking_userlist bu JOIN booking b ON bu.booking_no = b.booking_no WHERE bu.business_id = #{businessId} AND b.booking_no = #{bookingNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO visitant_userlist (normal_id, business_id, bookingok_no) VALUES (#{normalId}, #{businessId}, #{bookingokNo})
